Name: Dream of Kalpalata Lotus and Rose Leaves
Desc: A strange plant growing in the Veluriyam Mirage, it appears as light as a balloon and to be nearly floating. In the eyes of visitors from Sumeru, it appears to combine the petals of the Kalpalata Lotus with the leaves of the Sumeru Rose, and gives off a refreshing scent. In reality, in order to avoid the aroma clashing with the food guests bring with them, the plant has almost no smell...
